column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Howard - Thanks for your review. For the Tonkotsu Assari
column2: we use about 1/4 teaspoon of ginger paste to 1-1/2 cups of broth. We don't often hear that the broth is too gingery
column4: you can easily request that the chef not add ginger to the soup. Also
column6: it's possible the chef didn't fully separate the two slices of chashu meat
column7: leaving them double-stacked. But if they made the mistake of only adding one piece of chashu
column8: we strongly encourage our guests to let their server know so it can be remedied immediately. I hope you try us again and perhaps sample another ramen that might better suit your palate. We greatly appreciate your patronage and are pleased you tried us out.
